author: ehu
msg: Cleanup: More APR pre-0.9.5 compat cleanup.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/io.c (dir_make): Remove APR pre-0.9.5 compat code.

author: djames
msg: resolving trivial conflicts in r17405. We have included a summary of the
included changes below.
Clean autogenerated SWIG files when the user types "make clean" or "make
clean-swig" and we are not in release mode (r17405). Add "extraclean-swig"
rule for cleaning all SWIG-related files when we are in release mode (r17403).
Simplify clean rule handling (r17377, r17403). Clean libsvn_swig_perl
directory in clean-swig-pl (r17379).
* Makefile.in
(EXTRACLEAN_SWIG_HEADERS, EXTRACLEAN_SWIG_PL, EXTRACLEAN_SWIG_PY,
EXTRACLEAN_SWIG_RB): New variables.
(EXTRA_SWIG_PROXY_FILES): Remove. We don't need this list, as we can use
a wildcard to generate it.
(clean-swig-headers, clean-swig-pl, clean-swig-py, clean-swig-rb):
Only clean *.py files and *.c files in release mode. Use EXTRACLEAN_SWIG_*
variables. Don't clean *.py files in extraclean-swig-headers or
clean-swig-headers. Clean libsvn_swig_perl directory in clean-swig-pl.
(extraclean-swig-headers, extraclean-swig-pl, extraclean-swig-py,
extraclean-swig-rb): New rules. Use EXTRACLEAN_SWIG_* variables.
(clean-swig): Remove. This rule is now defined by gen_make.py.
* build/generator/gen_make.py
(write): Output "RELEASE_MODE = 1" when we are in release mode. Strip out
much of the complex and very verbose clean rule handling in favour of simple
rules using wildcards. Also, stop copying .i files to the builddir
unnecessarily, and instead refer to them in the source dir. Add clean-swig
and extraclean-swig rules, which clean all SWIG-related files.
(write_standalone): Add top_srcdir and top_builddir to standalone Makefile.

author: djames
msg: Create 1.3.x merge branch for cleaning autogenerated SWIG files when the
user types "make clean" and we are not in release mode.
Clean autogenerated SWIG files when the user types "make clean" and
we are not in release mode.
Justification:
Without this fix, a user would have to type
make extraclean
to clean the autogenerated SWIG files.

author: rooneg
msg: Revert r17481, since it was totally unnecessary.
* Makefile.in
(svncheck, svncheck6): Remove ./ from the commands for starting svnserve.

author: djames
msg: Always generate SWIG/C files and SWIG headers in the source directory.
(Now that the SWIG generated files are bundled in source tarballs, it makes
sense to treat them as "source directory" files. This change greatly
simplifies our SWIG build system, because we don't have to worry about
copying generated SWIG files from the source directory to the build directory
any more.)
* Makefile.in
(SWIG_PL_SRC_DIR): Add variable.
(EXTRACLEAN_SWIG_HEADERS, EXTRACLEAN_SWIG_PL, EXTRACLEAN_SWIG_PY,
EXTRACLEAN_SWIG_RB): Clean SWIG files from the source directory.
(copy-swig-py): Copy Python files directly from the source directory to
the libsvn directory.
* build/generator/gen_base.py
(TargetSWIG.add_dependencies): Read and write generated SWIG/C files in
the source directory.
* build/generator/gen_make.py
(write): Generate SWIG headers and SWIG/C files in source directory. Don't
copy SWIG/C files from the source directory to the build directory.
Suggested by: epg
Thread: http://svn.haxx.se/dev/archive-2005-11/1207.shtml
